ygData.subject: RE: The thrill of being a bard: was sonorous clounding  message
ygData.msgSnippet: Man that bites considering all the switching we do between weapons and instruments. Well I have dropped Lore like Tomahawks and Claw on the floor and its
ygData.messageBody:
Man that bites considering all the switching we do between weapons and
instruments. Well I have dropped Lore like Tomahawks and Claw on the floor
and its always been there to pickup. Its a good thing Verant is so quick to
replace bug-lost items. My best friend a 47th Monk zoned into Sol B 2 weeks
ago and arrived totally nekkid, Verant still hasnt replaced his stuff even
though they have promised a complete restore of his charactor.

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 12:36 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] The thrill of being a bard: was sonorous
clounding message


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

At 11:58 AM 8/31/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>
>
>Destroyed from what? I have dropped mine several times and just picked them
>up again off the ground. Either someone grabbed them after you dropped
them,
>or you just couldnt see the tiny icon on the ground, and it is a really
>small icon. Try to find it in a dark dungeon while some enraged Zol Knight

No - I can verify, it's a known bug. Lore items, when dropped (even when
dropped inside of a container) have a chance of being destroyed. I lost a
Shiny Brass Shield to this in Everfrost. :P

Talies the Wanderer
